what-we-do.title: 1.2 WHAT WE DO
what-we-do.description: Sécurité Services Plus (SS+) is Tunisia's trusted partner for comprehensive fire safety equipment and workplace safety solutions. We serve businesses of all sizes across Tunisia with quality products, professional installation, and reliable maintenance services.
what-we-do.extinguisher-types: All types: Powder, CO2, Foam, Water, Clean Agent.
what-we-do.installation-details: Professional installation with proper signage and mounting.
what-we-do.smoke-detector-services: Smoke detector sales, installation, and testing.
what-we-do.alarm-installation-maintenance: Fire alarm system installation and maintenance.
what-we-do.ppe-description: We supply comprehensive PPE (Personal Protective Equipment) solutions for all industries:
what-we-do.head-protection: Head Protection: Safety helmets, hard hats (various classes), bump caps, and accessories.
what-we-do.eye-face-protection: Eye & Face Protection: Safety glasses, goggles, face shields, welding helmets, and prescription safety eyewear.
what-we-do.hand-protection: Hand Protection: Work gloves (leather, cotton, synthetic), chemical-resistant, cut-resistant, heat-resistant, and disposable gloves.
what-we-do.respiratory-protection: Respiratory Protection: Dust masks, half-face/full-face respirators, filter cartridges (gas, vapor, particle), and escape respirators.
what-we-do.hearing-protection: Hearing Protection: Earplugs (disposable/reusable), earmuffs, and communication headsets.
what-we-do.fall-protection: Fall Protection: Safety harnesses, lanyards, anchor points, lifelines, and rescue equipment.
what-we-do.foot-protection: Foot Protection: Safety boots/shoes (steel/composite toe), chemical-resistant, and slip-resistant footwear.
what-we-do.industrial-workwear: Industrial Workwear: Coveralls, work shirts, trousers, High-visibility clothing (EN ISO 20471), and specialized protective clothing.
what-we-do.custom-branding-services: Custom Branding Services: Logo embroidery, screen printing, heat transfer printing, and corporate uniform programs.
what-we-do.industry-specific-workwear: Industry-Specific Workwear: Oil & gas (Flame Resistant FR), construction, manufacturing, food processing (hygienic), healthcare, and hospitality.
what-we-do.safety-signs: Safety Signs: Emergency exit (photoluminescent/LED), Warning, Mandatory, Prohibition, and Fire safety signs.
what-we-do.sign-production: Sign Production: Various materials (PVC, aluminum, Vinyl), all sizes, installation services, and compliance with international standards.
what-we-do.first-aid-kits: First aid boxes/kits (all sizes) and room equipment.

decisions.title: SECTION 2: HOW WE MAKE DECISIONS
decisions.matrix-description: This matrix defines who can make what decisions at SS+. Clear authority levels ensure efficient operations while maintaining proper controls.
decisions.approvers-label: Approvers: Karim BEN SALEM & Najla BEN SALEM
decisions.strat-business: Business strategy, new locations, major capital investments.
decisions.strat-policies: Company policies, legal matters, and banking.
decisions.strat-financial: Financial: Contracts > 10k TND, Discounts > 20%, Write-offs > 2k TND.
decisions.comm-najla: Sales Responsible (Najla): Pricing authority up to 25% discount, Order values up to 25,000 TND.
decisions.comm-reps: Sales Representatives: Standard quotations up to 15,000 TND, Discounts up to 15%.
decisions.comm-board: Board Tier: Any discount > 35% or strategic projects with significant margin impact.
decisions.comm-escalate: Must Escalate: Sales > 15,000 TND (Rep to Responsible), Sales > 25,000 TND (Responsible to Manager).
decisions.ops-responsible: Operations Responsible: Up to 5,000 TND (Planned equipment); Up to 1,500 TND (Emergency verbal).
decisions.ops-team-leaders: Team Leaders: Up to 1,000 TND (Consumables, service parts).
decisions.ops-technicians: Technicians: Up to 250 TND (Emergency on-site service recovery).
decisions.fin-purch-najla: Purchase Responsible (Najla): Up to 10,000 TND (Inventory replenishment, strategic stock).
decisions.fin-admin-lenda: Admin & Finance Responsible: Routine budget controls; Check processing; Payroll validation.
decisions.fin-manager-karim: Manager (Karim): Up to 25,000 TND (Major stock, capital equipment).
decisions.fin-board: Board of Directors: Above 25,000 TND (Major strategic investments).
decisions.thresh-purch-najla: 5,001 - 10,000 TND: Purchase Responsible (Najla). Dual signature required for checks.
decisions.sign-check-dual: Checks > 5,000 TND: Dual Signature Mandatory (Karim + Najla, or designated co-signatory).
decisions.sign-check-board: Checks > 10,000 TND: Board Notification also required.
decisions.sign-invoices: Invoices: Admin, Sales, or Ops Responsible.
decisions.ethics-intro: SS+ is committed to integrity. All employees must adhere to these guidelines.
decisions.conflict-prohibited: Prohibited: Financial interest in competitors, steering business to family/friends.
decisions.conflict-required: Required: Disclose family relationships or outside business activities annually.
decisions.gifts-allowed: Allowed: Nominal items (pens/calendars), occasional business meals.
decisions.gifts-prohibited: Prohibited: Cash/Gift Cards, expensive gifts (> 100 TND), or anything expecting influence.
decisions.conduct-do: Do: Be honest, deliver commitments, respect confidentiality.
decisions.conduct-dont: Don't: Badmouth competitors, disclose customer info, accept bribes.
decisions.report-unethical: Report unethical behavior to Supervisor or Manager. No retaliation for good-faith reporting.

standards.title: SECTION 3: OUR SERVICE STANDARDS
standards.response-times-note: Response times are calculated from ticket logging. On-site arrival depends on safe transit.
standards.extinguisher-inspection: Inspection: Visual check per code, photo evidence, tagging, report within 24h.
standards.co2-standards: CO2 Standards: Weight check must be within 5% of rated capacity to pass; refilling accuracy must be ±2%.
standards.installation-standards: Installation: Code-compliance placement, secure mounting, signage.
standards.qa-process: Process: Tech self-check → Team Leader review (100% doc, random physical) → Ops Spot-Check (20% monthly).
standards.rework-policy-short: Rework Policy: Valid quality issues reported within 7 days are corrected within 48 business hours at zero cost.
standards.tech-must-details: Be on time, wear uniform/ID, use PPE, clean up, communicate clearly.
standards.tech-must-not-details: Smoke on site, use foul language, rush work.
standards.workmanship-warranty-details: Workmanship Warranty: 6 months on labor and SS+ installed parts.
standards.re-inspection-window: Re-Inspection window: Free if reported within 7 calendar days of intervention.
standards.rework-commitment-details: Rework Commitment: Correction within 48 business hours of valid report.
standards.complaint-step-1: 1. Receive & Acknowledge: Listen, apologize, document, reference # (Immediate).
standards.ss-fault: SS+ Fault: Free rework, credit, apology.
